entry.name: Petroleum tax
entry.description: A tax levied on the volume of petroleum being transacted.

entry.name: Provisional countervailing duty cash
entry.description: Countervailing duty paid in cash prior to a formal finding of subsidization by Customs.

entry.name: Provisional countervailing duty bond
entry.description: Countervailing duty paid by posting a bond during an investigation period prior to a formal decision on subsidization by Customs.

entry.name: Tobacco tax
entry.description: A tax levied on tobacco products.

entry.name: Energy fee
entry.description: General fee or tax for the use of energy.

entry.name: Coffee tax
entry.description: A tax levied specifically on coffee products.

entry.name: Harmonised sales tax, Canadian
entry.description: A harmonized sales tax consisting of a goods and service tax, a Canadian provincial sales tax and, as applicable, a Quebec sales tax which is recoverable.

entry.name: Quebec sales tax
entry.description: A sales tax charged within the Canadian province of Quebec which is recoverable.

entry.name: Canadian provincial sales tax
entry.description: A sales tax charged within Canadian provinces which is non-recoverable.

entry.name: Tax on replacement part
entry.description: A tax levied on a replacement part, where the original part is returned.

entry.name: Mineral oil tax
entry.description: Tax that is levied specifically on products containing mineral oil.

entry.name: Special tax
entry.description: To indicate a special type of tax.

entry.name: Insurance tax
entry.description: A tax levied specifically on insurances.

entry.name: Provincial Cannabis Tax
entry.description: A tax levied on Cannabis products

entry.name: Outstanding duty interest
entry.description: Fee levied due to outstanding duties to be paid

entry.name: Anti-dumping duty
entry.description: Duty applied to goods ruled to have been dumped in an import market at a price lower than that in the exporter's domestic market.

entry.name: Stamp duty (Imposta di Bollo)
entry.description: Tax required in Italy, which may be fixed or graduated in various circumstances (e.g. VAT exempt documents or bank receipts).

entry.name: Agricultural levy
entry.description: Levy imposed on agricultural products where there is a difference between the selling price between trading countries.

entry.name: Car tax
entry.description: A tax that is levied on the value of the automobile.

entry.name: Paper consortium tax (Italy)
entry.description: Italian Paper consortium tax.

entry.name: Commodity specific tax
entry.description: Tax related to a specified commodity, e.g. illuminants, salts.

entry.name: Customs duty
entry.description: Duties laid down in the Customs tariff, to which goods are liable on entering or leaving the Customs territory (CCC).

entry.name: Countervailing duty
entry.description: A duty on imported goods applied for compensate for subsidies granted to those goods in the exporting country.

entry.name: Environmental tax
entry.description: Tax assessed for funding or assuring environmental protection or clean-up.

entry.name: Excise duty
entry.description: Customs or fiscal authorities code to identify a specific or ad valorem levy on a specific commodity, applied either domestically or at time of importation.

entry.name: Agricultural export rebate
entry.description: Monetary rebate given to the seller in certain circumstances when agricultural products are exported.

entry.name: Federal excise tax
entry.description: Tax levied by the federal government on the manufacture of specific items.

entry.name: Free
entry.description: No tax levied.

entry.name: General construction tax
entry.description: General tax for construction.

entry.name: Goods and services tax
entry.description: Tax levied on the final consumption of goods and services throughout the production and distribution chain.

entry.name: Illuminants tax
entry.description: Tax of illuminants.

entry.name: Import tax
entry.description: Tax assessed on imports.

entry.name: Individual tax
entry.description: A tax levied based on an individual's ability to pay.

entry.name: Business license fee
entry.description: Government assessed charge for permit to do business.

entry.name: Local construction tax
entry.description: Local tax for construction.

entry.name: Light dues payable
entry.description: Fee levied on a vessel to pay for port navigation lights.

entry.name: Local sales tax
entry.description: Assessment charges on sale of goods or services by city, borough country or other taxing authorities below state or provincial level.

entry.name: Lust tax
entry.description: Tax imposed for clean-up of leaky underground storage tanks.

entry.name: Monetary compensatory amount
entry.description: Levy on Common Agricultural Policy (European Union) goods used to compensate for fluctuating currencies between member states.

entry.name: Miscellaneous cash deposit
entry.description: Duty paid and held on deposit, by Customs, during an investigation period prior to a final decision being made on any aspect related to imported goods (except valuation) by Customs.

entry.name: Other taxes
entry.description: Unspecified, miscellaneous tax charges.

entry.name: Provisional duty bond
entry.description: Anti-dumping duty paid by posting a bond during an investigation period prior to a formal decision on dumping by Customs.

entry.name: Provisional duty cash
entry.description: Anti-dumping duty paid in cash prior to a formal finding of dumping by Customs.

entry.name: Preference duty
entry.description: Duties laid down in the Customs tariff, to which goods are liable on entering or leaving the Customs territory falling under a preferential regime such as Generalised System of Preferences (GSP).

entry.name: Special construction tax
entry.description: Special tax for construction.

entry.name: Shifted social securities
entry.description: Social securities share of the invoice amount to be paid directly to the social securities collector.

entry.name: State/provincial sales tax
entry.description: All applicable sale taxes by authorities at the state or provincial level, below national level.

entry.name: Suspended duty
entry.description: Duty suspended or deferred from payment.

entry.name: Surtax
entry.description: A tax or duty applied on and in addition to existing duties and taxes.

entry.name: Shifted wage tax
entry.description: Wage tax share of the invoice amount to be paid directly to the tax collector(s office).

entry.name: Alcohol mark tax
entry.description: A tax levied based on the type of alcohol being obtained.

entry.name: Total
entry.description: The summary amount of all taxes.

entry.name: Turnover tax
entry.description: Tax levied on the total sales/turnover of a corporation.

entry.name: Tonnage taxes
entry.description: Tax levied based on the vessel's net tonnage.

entry.name: Valuation deposit
entry.description: Duty paid and held on deposit, by Customs, during an investigation period prior to a formal decision on valuation of the goods being made.

entry.name: Value added tax
entry.description: A tax on domestic or imported goods applied to the value added at each stage in the production/distribution cycle.
